definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cast, throw, toss (Aram. mgad lapsus est et cecidit Lexx.; Targum Pa [[מַגֵּר]] hurl down 2 K 2Ki 9:33, overthrow);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. pl. cstr. [[מְגוּרֵי אֶל־חֶרֶב הָיוּ]] Ez Eze 21:17 they are thrown to the sword (on cstr. before prep. v. Ges:§ 130. l Da:Synt. § 28 R 1).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. :[[וְכִסְאוֹ לָאָרֶץ מִגַּֽ֠רְתָּה]] Ps 89:45 and his throne to earth thou hast hurled.
